pullrequest.title: Ubuntu debug package generation ready (need final test inside jenkins)

content.raw: @gerkey this pull is ready to be merged. It would be nice to find a way of testing this new packages (inside a jenkins work) before releasing them to users. We could run a fake debbuild without uploading to the repo the new packages.
content.html: @gerkey this pull is ready to be merged. It would be nice to find a way of testing this new packages (inside a jenkins work) before releasing them to users. We could run a fake debbuild without uploading to the repo the new packages.
